name: Ragdoll Test (Genesz)
description:
This is just to test webgl uploading and ragdolls
update:
now the model looks at the camera and moves it's hand too to test Inverse Kinematics

and you can push the ragdoll with the camera

Mouse: Look around

LMB: activates/restarts ragdoll

W: Move camera forward

S: Move camera backward

A: Move camera left

D: Move camera right

Space: Move camera up

Ctrl: Move camera down

Shift: Move faster
